title: load
extract: cargo, freight, freightage, charge, burden. 1.1in combination The total number or amount that can be carried in something, typically a vehicle or container. 'a lorry-load of soldiers'
extract_html: cargo, freight, freightage, charge, burden. 1.1in combination The total number or amount that can be carried in something, typically a vehicle or container. 'a lorry-load of soldiers'
